direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve loan-related data but for different states (ongoing vs. repayment history).
Both methods involve loan repayment operations with similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods access and manipulate loan-related accounts, though for different purposes.
Both methods modify the state of loan accounts, though in different contexts (borrowing vs. repayment history).
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to loan operations, though they serve different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the loan account is a prerequisite for both repayment history and other loan operations.
Repayment operations need to be tested in conjunction with the retrieval of repayment history.
Both methods verify loan repayment statuses and handle similar exceptions.
